body.p: An entity is encouraged to disclose assumptions used to determine the recoverable amount of assets (cash‑generating units) during the period. However, paragraph 134 requires an entity to disclose information about the estimates used to measure the recoverable amount of a cash‑generating unit when goodwill or an intangible asset with an indefinite useful life is included in the carrying amount of that unit.
